Cards.Name: Embargo
Cards.FullText: +2 Coins, Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. - When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

Cards.Name: Haven
Cards.FullText: +1 Card, +1 Action, Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

Cards.Name: Lighthouse
Cards.FullText: +1 Action, Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Coin. - While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.

Cards.Name: Native Village
Cards.SpecialText: You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.
Cards.FullText: You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.

Cards.Name: Pearl Diver
Cards.FullText: +1 Card, +1 Action, Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

Cards.Name: Ambassador
Cards.SpecialText: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.
Cards.FullText: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

Cards.Name: Fishing Village
Cards.FullText: +2 Actions, +1 Coin, At the start of your next turn: +1 Action, +1 Coin.

Cards.Name: Lookout
Cards.FullText: +1 Action, Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

Cards.Name: Smugglers
Cards.SpecialText: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.
Cards.FullText: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

Cards.Name: Warehouse
Cards.FullText: +3 Card, +1 Action, Discard 3 cards.

Cards.Name: Caravan
Cards.SpecialText: At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.
Cards.FullText: At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

Cards.Name: Cutpurse
Cards.FullText: +2 Coins, Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

Cards.Name: Island
Cards.SpecialText: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.<hr>2 VP
Cards.FullText: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.<hr>2 VP

Cards.Name: Navigator
Cards.FullText: +2 Coins, Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

Cards.Name: Pirate Ship
Cards.SpecialText: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.
Cards.FullText: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

Cards.Name: Salvager
Cards.FullText: +1 Buy, Trash a card from your hand. +Coins equal to its cost.

Cards.Name: Sea Hag
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.
Cards.FullText: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

Cards.Name: Treasure Map
Cards.SpecialText: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.
Cards.FullText: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

Cards.Name: Bazaar
Cards.FullText: +1 Card, +2 Actions, +1 Coin.

Cards.Name: Explorer
Cards.SpecialText: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.
Cards.FullText: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

Cards.Name: Ghost Ship
Cards.FullText: +2 Card, Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

Cards.Name: Merchant Ship
Cards.SpecialText: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.
Cards.FullText: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.

Cards.Name: Outpost
Cards.SpecialText: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.
Cards.FullText: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

Cards.Name: Tactician
Cards.SpecialText: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.
Cards.FullText: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.

Cards.Name: Treasury
Cards.FullText: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Coin, When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

Cards.Name: Wharf
Cards.SpecialText: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, +1 Buy.
Cards.FullText: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, +1 Buy.
